attributes.title: I absolutely hate this
attributes.review: this app killed my parents. that’s it they’re just gone. one minute they were here and the next they were gone. i know it was this app. it had to be, because the last thing they told me was “honey the trump administration stole our toaster”. i miss them everyday. but they will never return. mom and dad if you’re reading this i love you. #ripmytoaster

attributes.title: awful and horrible
attributes.review: this app has done awful things to not only my phone but my life. as soon as i opened this app my phone started to glitch and I could not get it to stop until i deleted the app. second, it gave me horrible nightmares. i don’t even want to go into detail because even thinking about it traumatizes me but long story short DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. IT CAN KILL YOU AND YOUR DOG

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I hated this app and pretty much everyone I know who has tried this app agrees. It’s a horrible app and the whole time you just see Bunker Boy, I almost went blind by how much I was forced to look at him! I never realized before this app how orange he is until his skin started giving me head aches 😤. I very much regret getting this app and recommend others to stay away from it

attributes.title: Cursed
attributes.review: I opened the app only to find out it crashes everything! My phone heated up i had to put it in the freezer while i left to go run an errand. I come back home to find out i don’t have a home! Set my house on fire!! If you’re wondering how i’m posting this review i’m using my nokia phone. It’s the only thing that survived the whole ordeal. -♾/10 I don’t recommend

attributes.title: um no, just no
attributes.review: First of all, this app is like a nightmare waiting to happen, an obese orange with a corn husk on top of it. It’s like a spray tan gone wrong, leave it to the blonde teenage girls. It’s just not a good look on you. Secondly, as soon as I opened this app a bunch of Johnny Galindo accounts started texting me. After that, I accidentally fell off a cliff because I got so distracted by another Cheeto like figure I saw on this app. This app is just a no.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This is a horrible app. When I open the the app it literally showed me how tiny it his thing 🍤 probably tinier but no sir. After all that it started to glitch and say racial slur songs. Can u believe after all that chaos the trump app tried to kidnap me, I said no I’m a minor and they said good your trumps type. I’m just saying don’t download this app. Trump 2020 ✨🧚🏼💕💫🧚🏼‍♂️ in the graveyard. baddie🧚🏼✨💖but the bad is silent.

attributes.title: This made me cry
attributes.review: When i went into the app, i saw a big ugly orange. He had his old saggy balls hanging and it made me want to die. I threw up many times but i returned to the app. My pet caterpillar crawled onto my phone and DIED! I cried for many hours but decided that i should eat my caterpillar in honor. When i was walking my pet T-rex i saw donald trump, flying in the sky totally naked. He was swinging his peepee out and i died. I am now a ghost. RIP me

attributes.title: i tried to scream... but my head was underwater
attributes.review: this is a terrible app. 👩🏾‍🦲 this weird Cheeto man appeared on my screen when i opened the app. 💀 yuckkk i hate the Cheeto man 😎 he need help. but my TV started to glow when i opened the app and i hated it. i hope that you guys are safe when downloading this app because my dog and sister are now making out 😽 ya like jazz? anyways, luv ❤️ i hope the y’all are safe. bye 👋🏾

attributes.title: I don’t expect much but I’m still let down
attributes.review: This app is disappointing. It is as stupid as the man who claims it. It asked to many personal questions that I will never submit to answer. There is no reason for this carrot stick to know my private info. This man also has the audacity to ask for my money when he was millions. If I was allowed I would’ve rated the app zero stars. VOTE BLUE.
